Name: Now You See - A Hand Painted Horror Adventure
About the game: Seeking shelter from a thunderstorm, the house you've entered is not the sanctuary you'd hoped for. Uncover horrible secrets within and use your wits and the items you find to escape this immersive blood soaked nightmare... STORY. PUZZLES. GORE. Original Score by Classic Point & Click adventure, played in first-person perspective. Grisly hand painted 2D art. Disturbingly voiced characters. Fiendish puzzles and a full inventory system. Lashings of atmosphere and gore. Find all of the tiny dolls scattered about the house. Unfold a dark story about ritual, blood and survival. Use your wits to escape this immersive nightmare.
